features: Wonderful High End Japanese Gift- Treat yourself or bring calm & happiness to loved ones. Japanese Zen Garden for desk; gorgeously packaged with the elements for inner peace. A deluxe, Zen gift set
Bring practical Japanese Decor to your Home. Generous 15 premium features for endless arranging. Asian inspired Cherry Blossom Trees, Shinto Torii Gate, Zen Rocks, ceramic Pagoda, Bridge, Lotus, Moss
Beautiful, 100% Safe, CPSIA compliant Sand (16oz) for your desktop Zen Garden. Specific Canadian rock for sand with sparkle & No free Quartz/Silica. Avoid sand spills with our large wooden sand tray.
Discover Surprising Meaning, History & Culture of the features in our coffee table top Japanese Zen Garden with our inspiring & informative unique guide to accompany your Desk Zen garden decoration
Be Creative & Indulge Your Imagination. Master the calming skill of sand raking with 6 lovingly handcrafted bamboo rakes & tools. Make stunning patterns in our indoor desktop zen sand garden for desk
body.description: Getting the most from your new Zen Rock Garden Relax... Whether it's from work, commuting, or juggling life's pressures, the chances are we can all relate to stress or anxiety. Most studies agree that well over half of Americans suffer from regular stress, & anxiety affects an alarmingly high number of us. The good news is that for many, Zen Gardens are a perfect way to restore a sense of balance & calm. The arranging of features & raking of the sand encourages the mind and body to relax, by focussing on the here & the now. Let's begin... Simply fill the wooden tray of your zen sand garden with plentiful soft white sand. Enjoy choosing bamboo tools to create an array of designs that symbolize the landscape. Placing features in your raked landscape, lose yourself in a creative moment. Our deluxe Japanese sand garden is your path to mindful meditation. Use as a meditation kit or to simply relax & unwind. Treat yourself or someone special It's been a tough couple of years. Whether you're feeling stressed or anxious, or could just use some relaxation, our Zen Gardens could be just what you need. Why not treat a loved one this. We've found they're popular as unique birthday, celebration or new home/office gifts for all ages (from teens to adults), as well as for those who want to give the gift of calm to a loved one.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More Choice, More Space, More Sand: 12 traditional features for endless arranging possibilities In addition to 16oz of deep Soft White Zen Garden Sand in a large 11 x 8 inch Black Wooden sandbox (& 6 bamboo tools), you'll discover 12 traditional features within, each beautifully crafted with great attention to detail. Plus, browse through the enclosed color guide to reveal the meaning of the pieces. Carefully compiled to enhance your Zen Garden. You may even learn some Japanese along the way. Japanese home decor such as our desk-top Zen Garden, offers a peaceful escape. For us, the most important part of any Zen Garden in the sand. Scroll down to learn more about our beautifully soft, sparkling white sand. It's important, so we recommend checking what you're getting. Our desktop Zen Gardens feature a single, larger space, not several small zones. With plenty of sand included with our Zen Gardens, this enables you to create amazing patterns across a larger area. We believe this is the most satisfying & reflective of traditional Zen Gardens.

So what's included in your new Zen Garden? Synonymous with Japan Torii - Traditional Japanese Shinto Gate (vermillion with a black lintel)Sakura Cherry Blossom - beautifully delicate/natural bark base (2 Pcs) ~ Discover more about the features in the enclosed full-color guide - mixing beautiful photography and narrative to illustrate the significance of each piece So what's included in your new Zen Garden? Asian inspired buildings Ornate Pagoda (Glazed, hand-painted ceramic)Bridge (Cobbled/mottled bridge effect) ~ Discover more about the features in the enclosed full-color guide - mixing beautiful photography and narrative to illustrate the significance of each piece So what's included in your new Zen Garden? Specially chosen rocks Large natural, black, smooth, stackable Zen Rocks (3 Pcs)Small natural River Rocks (1 Bag) ~ Discover more about the features in the enclosed full-color guide - mixing beautiful photography and narrative to illustrate the significance of each piece So what's included in your new Zen Garden? Inspired by the natural world Textured thick Green Moss (2 pieces; 1x medium & 1x large)Lotus Flower ~ Discover more about the features in the enclosed full-color guide - mixing beautiful photography and narrative to illustrate the significance of each piece Synonymous with Japan Asian inspired buildings Specially chosen rocks Inspired by the natural world

More Tools: 6 beautifully handcrafted 7" bamboo rakes & tools, enclosed in a beautiful ribbon-wrapped gift box Most sets offer 1-2 tools, sometimes in plastic, but we think that's like being an artist without the right paintbrushes. With our full set of six unique handmade bamboo tools, let your creativity run free, effortlessly creating healing meditative patterns in your zen sand garden for desk. The larger tray has plenty of sand to fully cover the base. And with deep sides, you don't have to worry about spilling sand whilst still enjoying sand raking to the full. Each tool is approx 7" long. Adjustable Five-spike rake (create extra-wide patterns)Smoother tool (smooth the sand before a new design)Triangular-toothed rake (design shallow, wide patterns)Four-spike rake (mark out deep, narrow patterns)Circle-drawing tool (form beautiful concentric rings)Detailer stylus (draw free-form, unique patterns) Our video demonstrates what you can achieve with these tools in your Japanese Sand Garden.

At home or at work, our deluxe Japanese Zen Garden Kit is your path to mindful meditation. Customize to your hearts content! Master Complex Patterns With 6 tools, 15 features, including a large tray with deep soft white sand and an accompanying guide, you're free to master complex patterns & designs. You'll be surprised by what you can create. Depending on your mood each day, you may find that you achieve the desired result using just a few features & a more simplistic pattern. With so many tools & features, enjoy the luxury & freedom of being able to make it truly yours, reinventing it over and over as you wish. Great Home Office Decor Have you or a loved one started working from home more during the last year? This may well be just what they need to restore a sense of calm. Our Zen Gardens feature one large space, not several small sections. For us, the joy of a Zen garden is the ability to create long, flowing patterns. We think you'll agree! Keep on the side for your coffee break, or to keep calm during stressful meetings or tasks. 100% Safe Soft Sparkling White Sand (16oz). Leak-proof packaging Not ALL sand is equal. Luckily with ours, you're assured of ultimate quality & safety; proudly using only 100% Safe, CPSIA & Prop. 65 compliant Canadian sand. Our carefully chosen supplier crushes specific rock, giving beautifully soft, gently sparkling sand.No Contaminants. No free Quartz or Silica. It's important, so unlike some other brands, we never compromise.Incredibly clear raked patterns in the sand. We tested multiple sand grain sizes to ensure we use the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Zen Garden
reviews.reviewText: This gorgeous Zen Garden is exactly as advertised. Makes a lovely gift. It's extra large with lots of pieces. It arrived in perfect condition; all pieces included, and the sand is "sparkly" which adds to the visual relaxation. A little on the pricey side compared to others, but worth every penny! Quality product. Highly recommend. A+++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was amazing. It had hand crafted bamboo, shiny decor, and fine sand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cool little zen garden. All pieces are beautiful and fun to set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This zen garden works great when consulting with clients. Helps them relax.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Surprising how relaxing it is to fiddle with. Wish the tray was heavier, but I found a marble tray to replace the plastic one. Like the decorative things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kit has a lot of options
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice mini kit that has a lot of garden options (e.g., 2 moss mounds, 3 stones, 1 pagoda, 1 bridge, 2 trees, a packet of pebbles, 6 sand rakes, and 1 lotus flower, whereas a lot of other kits just provide 2 or 3 of those items). The lotus flower in my kit had two of its petals broken off, but I didn't mind re-attaching them with super glue. The "wood chip" platform upon which each tree is supposed to stand is like balsa wood, so one of mine broke in half when I tried to connect it to the tree, but it was easy to reattach with a little bit of super glue and a small piece of painter's tape on the bottom. The kit came with a thank you card from the seller that stated if something was missing or damaged, the seller would promptly replace the missing or damaged item, so you do have that option if you don't want to fix a minor break in one of the items. The bag of sand is generous. I didn't need to empty out the entire bag of sand to fill up the tray. The kit also comes with an accordion-like information card that briefly describes the significance of each garden item (e.g., the moss mounds, etc.). I'm glad I got this for myself. It would also make a nice gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was given this for Christmas and have found so much joy with it already. I look forward to researching more about this fabulous gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars she liked it
reviews.reviewText: My girl loved her garden, I like to draw things in it for her when she is not around ...
Pleins de jolies décorations pour un style zen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful kit, the tray is a perfect size and all the accessories are of an excellent quality (with the tiny exception of the pagoda which is a bit plastic-y.) There are so many variations possible with everything provided and it’s a very satisfying activity to become absorbed in. I’m glad I didn’t go for one of the cheaper kits although this one is by no means too expensive. Thank you, Holly and James.
The components are really high quality for the price, and it’s a joy to work on the little garden as a mediation exercise between stressful meetings at work. Thank you for making this product.
Happy with my purchase, beautiful items.
